{"name": "Grove City Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Clients will receive food  by appointment only.
The numbers below connect you to LSS 211 Central Ohio to make an appointment with the Grove City Food Pantry. Lines are open Monday through Friday from 8:00am to 4:00pm.
Phone: Dial 211
Documents: (Please check when making appointment for ID requirements).", "email": "", "url": "https://www.grovecityfoodpantry.org/getfood.html", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2710 Columbus Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Monterey Park", "state_province": "OH", "postal_code": "43123", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.8816115, "longitude": -83.07512419999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(614) 871-2588", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of household income required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}]}
